description.plain:
Ali Gatie is an artist from a suburb of Toronto (Mississauga). Everything you need to know about Ali Gatie is expressed through his music, furthered through his brand Li$N (“listen”).

All about the music is something Ali will always be, and his only hope is that you take the time to Li$N.

songs.title: Moonlight

description.plain:
“Moonlight” is the second track off of Ali Gatie’s 2019 debut album, YOU. The song, boasting 96 million Spotify plays, helped the album debut at number 123 on the Billboard Top 200 during the week ending on November 22nd, 2019.

“Moonlight” was released on August 2nd, 2018, the first pre-release song for Ali’s debut album. Ali was quoted in an interview with Complex saying:

I wrote “Moonlight” at a time where I was mending my broken heart in hopes it would help me and others around the world navigate through that same pain.

The music video, released much later than the song, (on May 1st, 2019) was a very emotional piece of work. The video followed Ali through a romantic relationship, the ups, and downs that come with it, and follows various couples of different races, ethnicities, genders, and sexualities.

songs.embed_content: Read “Moonlight” by Ali Gatie on Genius

songs.title: It’s You

description.plain:
On “It’s You,” Ali Gatie pours all of his remaining amount of love. He discusses the true pain of falling in love with someone who does not reciprocate his feelings, or, more properly, his dread of falling in love with someone who may not reciprocate his feelings.

Over a guitar ballad, he also reflects on having his heart broken in the past, but he is determined to find love again and withstand his fears of getting heartbroken. He, later on, discussed the inspiration behind the song’s video via billboard, as he stated:

Without giving too much away, the video showcases love in all of its forms, shapes and sizes. The video tries to represent every person or situation that “It’s You” could be for each listener. It’s very diverse and showcases love in different ways.

songs.embed_content: Read “It’s You” by Ali Gatie on Genius

songs.title: Can’t Lie

description.plain: Following the success of his soulful single “Losing You,” Mississauga, Ontario native, Ali Gatie releases an emotionally charged single “Can’t Lie,” which identifies with the same tonalities and underpinnings of his genuis musical discography fueled by honest and raw lyrical content over incendiary sound waves.  Featuring a smooth beat, courtesy of Shumxi, the foundation of the track is coupled with gentle coaxing lyricism from the 20 year old artist. “Can’t Lie” is a song that depicts the confession of longing for someone who you know is a detriment.

songs.embed_content: Read “Can't Lie” by Ali Gatie on Genius
